compliance_assessment.framework_description: General Data Protection Regulation, a regulation in EU law on data protection and privacy.

requirements.requirement: Obtain explicit consent from users for data processing.
requirements.evidence: User consent mechanisms are in place but need enhancement.
gaps: Lack of clear consent management process.
recommendations: Implement a user-friendly consent management system.

requirements.requirement: Ensure the right to access and delete personal data.
requirements.evidence: Users can request data deletion via the User Service.

requirements.requirement: Implement data protection by design and by default.
requirements.evidence: Some data protection measures are implemented.
gaps: Not all services have data protection measures integrated.
recommendations: Conduct a data protection impact assessment (DPIA) for all services.

critical_gaps: Insufficient data protection measures in some services.
remediation_plan: Enhance consent management processes to ensure explicit user consent.
Conduct DPIAs for all microservices to identify and mitigate data protection risks.
